attributes.additional_details: EHLERS-DANLOS SYNDROME (EDS) IS A  GENETIC TISSUE CONDITION WHICH IS THOUGHT  1 IN 5,000 PEOLPE ONLY ARE KNOWN TO HAVE THIS CONDITION, THERE ARE STILL MANY AFFECTED PEOPLE WHO HAVE BEEN MISDIAGNOSED AND LIKEWISE RECIEVED IN CORRECT TREATMENT, MANY A GP DOES NOT UNDERSTAND THAT IT CAN EFFECT THE WHOLE BODY  INTERNAL ORGANS AND SYSTEMS, MANY RELY ON FEEDING TUBES..PLEASE HELP TO MAKE OUR DEBILITATING  INVISABLE.ILLNESS... VISABLE BY SIGNING TO HELP THE UK PLAN FOR RARE DISEASES.
